verses.verse: שׁ֚וּבָה <WH7725> return יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> O Israel עַ֖ד <WH5704> against יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God כִּ֥י <WH3588> for כָשַׁ֖לְתָּ <WH3782> for thou hast fallen בַּעֲוֹנֶֽךָ׃ <WH5771> by thine iniquity

קְח֤וּ <WH3947> Take עִמָּכֶם֙ <WH5973> with דְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> with you words וְשׁ֖וּבוּ <WH7725> and turn אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to the LORD אִמְר֣וּ <WH559> say אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> away כָּל־ <WH3605> all תִּשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> unto him Take away עָוֹן֙ <WH5771> all iniquity וְקַח־ <WH3947> and receive ט֔וֹב <WH2896> [us] graciously וּֽנְשַׁלְּמָ֥ה <WH7999> so will we render פָרִ֖ים <WH6499> the calves שְׂפָתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH8193> of our lips

אַשּׁ֣וּר ׀ <WH804> Asshur לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יוֹשִׁיעֵ֗נוּ <WH3467> shall not save עַל־ <WH5921> on סוּס֙ <WH5483> upon horses לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor נִרְכָּ֔ב <WH7392> us we will not ride וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor נֹ֥אמַר <WH559> neither will we say ע֛וֹד <WH5750> again אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> [Ye are] our gods לְמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> any more to the work יָדֵ֑ינוּ <WH3027> of our hands אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בְּךָ֖ יְרֻחַ֥ם <WH7355> findeth mercy יָתֽוֹם׃ <WH3490> for in thee the fatherless

אֶרְפָּא֙ <WH7495> I will heal מְשׁ֣וּבָתָ֔ם <WH4878> their backsliding אֹהֲבֵ֖ם <WH157> I will love נְדָבָ֑ה <WH5071> them freely כִּ֛י <WH3588> for שָׁ֥ב <WH7725> is turned away אַפִּ֖י <WH639> for mine anger מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at

אֶהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> will be like כַטַּל֙ <WH2919> I will be as the dew לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> unto Israel יִפְרַ֖ח <WH6524> he shall grow כַּשּֽׁוֹשַׁנָּ֑ה <WH7799> as the lily וְיַ֥ךְ <WH5221> and cast forth שָׁרָשָׁ֖יו <WH8328> his roots כַּלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> as Lebanon

יֵֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> will sprout יֹֽנְקוֹתָ֔יו <WH3127> His branches וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> will be like כַזַּ֖יִת <WH2132> shall be as the olive tree הוֹד֑וֹ <WH1935> and his beauty וְרֵ֥יחַֽ <WH7381> and his smell ל֖וֹ כַּלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> as Lebanon

יָשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> shall return יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> They that dwell בְצִלּ֔וֹ <WH6738> under his shadow יְחַיּ֥וּ <WH2421> they shall revive דָגָ֖ן <WH1715> [as] the corn וְיִפְרְח֣וּ <WH6524> and grow כַגָּ֑פֶן <WH1612> as the vine זִכְר֖וֹ <WH2143> the scent כְּיֵ֥ין <WH3196> thereof [shall be] as the wine לְבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> of Lebanon ס

אֶפְרַ֕יִם <WH669> Ephraim מַה־ <WH4100> what לִּ֥י ע֖וֹד <WH5750> more לָֽעֲצַבִּ֑ים <WH6091> idol אֲנִ֧י <WH589> I עָנִ֣יתִי <WH6030> testify וַאֲשׁוּרֶ֗נּוּ <WH7789> [him] and observed אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I כִּבְר֣וֹשׁ <WH1265> fir tree רַֽעֲנָ֔ן <WH7488> him I [am] like a green מִמֶּ֖נִּי <WH4480> at פֶּרְיְךָ֥ <WH6529> From me is thy fruit נִמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> found

מִ֤י <WH4310> Whoever חָכָם֙ <WH2450> Who [is] wise וְיָ֣בֵֽן <WH995> and he shall understand אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these נָב֖וֹן <WH995> these [things]? prudent וְיֵֽדָעֵ֑ם <WH3045> and he shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יְשָׁרִ֞ים <WH3477> [are] right דַּרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> them? for the ways יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God וְצַדִּקִים֙ <WH6662> and the just יֵ֣לְכוּ <WH1980> will walk בָ֔ם וּפֹשְׁעִ֖ים <WH6586> in them but the transgressors יִכָּ֥שְׁלוּ <WH3782> shall fall בָֽם׃
